task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 343°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To see the full height of the target building, I need to look up to view its roof, so I will rotate the camera upward with a pitch delta of 30 degrees.
I need to see the full roof of the target building to estimate its height, so I will rotate the camera further upward with a pitch delta of 30 degrees to get a clearer view of the top structure.

To confirm the base of the target building is at ground level and ensure I can reference the full vertical span, I will rotate the camera downward with a pitch delta of -60 degrees to view the ground portion of the building.

I have viewed the full vertical span of the target building from ground to roof, and estimate its height to be 24 meters based on it appearing to be an 8-story structure with each floor approximately 3 meters tall.
